| HistoryText             = The '''Roxxon Corporation Board of Directors''' was the Executive Council which oversaw the activities and the management of '''[[Roxxon Energy Corporation (Earth-616)|Roxxon Energy Corporation]]''', formerly known as ''Republic Oil and Natural Gas''.{{r|Iron Man: The Iron Age #1|2}}

Republic Oil's President [[Hugh Jones (Earth-616)|Hugh Jones]] authorized Vice President [[Simon Krieger (Earth-616)|Simon Krieger]] to arrange the death of business antagonists [[Howard Stark (Earth-616)|Howard]] and [[Maria Stark (Earth-616)|Maria Stark]], owners of [[Stane International (Earth-616)|Stark Industries]].{{r|Iron Man: The Iron Age #1}}

Later Jones organized a Board meeting with Krieger, V.P. of Foreign Operations [[John Gamelin (Earth-616)|John T. Gamelin]] and V.P. of Research [[Jonas Hale (Earth-616)|Jonas Hale]] in order to find a way to take over Stark Industries from [[Anthony Stark (Earth-616)|Tony Stark]]'s control; Krieger first contacted the [[Saboteur (Earth-616)|Saboteur]], who was stopped by Iron Man (secretly Tony Stark himself),{{r|Iron Man: The Iron Age #1}} and later tried to impersonate Stark at a [[S.H.I.E.L.D. Executive Board (Earth-616)|S.H.I.E.L.D. Board]] meeting; however the real Stark arrived dressed as Iron Man, revealing the imposter's identity as Roxxon executive Simon Krieger. While Krieger was in prison, President Jones had him killed by one of his men; later, at a Board meeting, he officially changed Republic Oil's corporate name into ''Roxxon Oil Corporation''.{{r|Iron Man: The Iron Age #2}}
